properties.name: Victoria Island Penthouse
properties.description: Luxurious penthouse with panoramic views of Lagos lagoon. Features include marble finishes, smart home automation, and private rooftop terrace.

properties.name: Ikoyi Waterfront Villa
properties.description: Stunning waterfront villa with private jetty and infinity pool. Premium finishes throughout with chef's kitchen and wine cellar.

properties.name: Lekki Phase 1 Mansion
properties.description: Contemporary mansion in gated community. Features cinema room, gym, staff quarters, and beautifully landscaped gardens.

properties.name: Banana Island Estate
properties.description: Ultra-luxury estate on prestigious Banana Island. Private beach access, helipad, and world-class amenities.

properties.name: Abuja Central Apartment
properties.description: Modern apartment in the heart of Abuja. Floor-to-ceiling windows, premium appliances, and 24/7 concierge service.

properties.name: Port Harcourt GRA Duplex
properties.description: Elegant duplex in exclusive Government Reservation Area. Spacious living areas, private garden, and security features.

properties.name: Maitama Presidential Villa
properties.description: Presidential villa in diplomatic zone with ballroom, indoor pool, home theater, and lush tropical gardens. Complete privacy with diplomatic-grade security.

properties.name: Osborne Foreshore Estate
properties.description: Modern architectural masterpiece with clean lines and full automation. Features include smart home system, elevator, and private gym.

properties.name: Asokoro Hilltop Residence
properties.description: Exclusive hilltop residence with panoramic views of Abuja city. Featuring infinity pool, wine cellar, and separate guest house.

properties.name: Eko Atlantic Skyline Penthouse
properties.description: Ultra-modern penthouse in Nigeria's most prestigious development with 360° views of Atlantic Ocean and Lagos skyline. Private elevator and rooftop terrace.

properties.name: Calabar Waterfront Estate
properties.description: Colonial-inspired estate with private access to Calabar River. Featuring boat dock, tropical gardens, and guest quarters.

properties.name: Kaduna Golf Estate Villa
properties.description: Exclusive villa overlooking Kaduna Golf Club with direct course access. Features include outdoor entertainment area, pool, and private study.

properties.name: Enugu Highlands Retreat
properties.description: Serene retreat in the Enugu highlands with tropical gardens and panoramic views. Traditional architecture with modern luxury amenities.

properties.name: Luxury Apartment at The Azuri
properties.description: Premium apartment in The Azuri development with access to 5-star hotel amenities. Concierge service, spa, fitness center, and infinity pool.

properties.name: Abuja Ministers' Hill Residence
properties.description: Prestigious residence in diplomatic district featuring ballroom, library, wine cellar, and private security detail.

properties.name: Park View Estate Townhouse
properties.description: Contemporary townhouse in exclusive Park View Estate. Features include rooftop garden, private elevator, and smart home technology.
